Entry.JapaneseText: [VARIABLE]
Entry.EnglishText: [VARIABLE]

Entry.JapaneseText: <Claire>
Entry.EnglishText: <Claire>

Entry.JapaneseText: マルコ
Entry.EnglishText: Marco

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue>

Entry.JapaneseText: ラキヤ
Entry.EnglishText: Rakia

Entry.JapaneseText: スティーブ
Entry.EnglishText: Steve

Entry.JapaneseText: <Tytree>
Entry.EnglishText: <Tytree>

Entry.JapaneseText: おじいさん
Entry.EnglishText: Old Man

Entry.JapaneseText: スールズの老剣士
Entry.EnglishText: Old Swordsman

Entry.JapaneseText: select
Entry.EnglishText: Select

Entry.JapaneseText: スールズ
Entry.EnglishText: Sulz

Entry.JapaneseText: スールズ
Entry.EnglishText: Sulz

Entry.JapaneseText: <Claire>の家
Entry.EnglishText: <Claire>'s House

Entry.JapaneseText: ただいま、 お父さん、お母さん。
Entry.EnglishText: Mother, Father! I'm home!

Entry.JapaneseText: おお、クレア、<Veigue>……
Entry.EnglishText: Oh, why if it isn't Claire and <Veigue>?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……ただいま、 おじさん、おばさん。
Entry.EnglishText: Aunt, Uncle, I'm home.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……お帰りなさい。
Entry.EnglishText: ...Welcome home.

Entry.JapaneseText: よ、よお、<Veigue>。 帰ってたのか……！
Entry.EnglishText: H-hey there, <Veigue>. So you're home!

Entry.JapaneseText: 何か、うちに用事か？
Entry.EnglishText: Do you need something?

Entry.JapaneseText: いや……別に…… なあ……この香り……
Entry.EnglishText: Not really... Hey, I smell something...

Entry.JapaneseText: ああ、ポプラおばさんの ピーチパイの香りだ。
Entry.EnglishText: Yeah, Aunt Poplar baked some peach pies.

Entry.JapaneseText: やっぱりな……
Entry.EnglishText: I knew it...

Entry.JapaneseText: 食べていったらどうだ？
Entry.EnglishText: Would you like to have some?

Entry.JapaneseText: えっ、あ、いや……俺はいいや…… ほら、なんとなく、な？
Entry.EnglishText: Ah, n-no...I'm fine. It would be kind of, well...you know.

Entry.JapaneseText: おう、<Veigue>！ この景色、この空気…… 最高だな！
Entry.EnglishText: Yo, <Veigue>! The scenery, the weather... It's all perfect here!

Entry.JapaneseText: さ、行って来いよ。 村の人の話を聞きに……
Entry.EnglishText: Alrighty, let's get moving. I wanna talk to the people here...
Entry.Notes: Literally "OK, let's go. To hear what the villagers have to say..."

Entry.JapaneseText: 今、クレアちゃんが来たけど……
Entry.EnglishText: Claire is back now...

Entry.JapaneseText: 助かったんかいのう？
Entry.EnglishText: So she's been saved?

Entry.JapaneseText: スールズは寒い地方だが、 作物には恵まれているのじゃ。
Entry.EnglishText: Even though Sulz is in a cold region, we are blessed with crops.

Entry.JapaneseText: 南のボーダリア地方、特に砂漠の方は 過酷な環境らしいのう……
Entry.EnglishText: The southern Bordalia region seems like nothing but inhospitable desert...

Entry.JapaneseText: クレアちゃんがさらわれて、 マルコさんも気の毒に……
Entry.EnglishText: Claire was kidnapped, poor Marco...

Entry.JapaneseText: でも、こんな時、 頼りの<Veigue>がいてくれて、 本当によかったのう……
Entry.EnglishText: But it's good that he can rely on <Veigue> at a time like this...

Entry.JapaneseText: ポプラおばさんの言う事も 一理あるわ。
Entry.EnglishText: Ms. Poplar has a point.

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマのじいさんと 仲良くしとったが、金輪際、 口は利かんと決めたんじゃ。
Entry.EnglishText: Ever since I had a falling out with that Huma geezer, I ain't talking to no more Huma even if my life depends on it.

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマとは口を利かんと 決めたんじゃ……
Entry.EnglishText: I ain't talking to Huma...

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>か……
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue>, huh...

Entry.JapaneseText: ワシはどうして…… 何を……あんなにムキになって ヒューマの事を責めておったのじゃ？
Entry.EnglishText: Why did I do that...? What was I so defensive about that I started condemning the Huma...?

Entry.JapaneseText: ワシはどうして…… 何を……あんなにムキになって ヒューマの事を責めておったのじゃ？
Entry.EnglishText: Why did I do that...? What was I so defensive about that I started condemning the Huma...?

Entry.JapaneseText: なんだったんじゃ……？
Entry.EnglishText: What was that all about...?

Entry.JapaneseText: ううむ…… ヒューマと会うのは 気が進まんな……
Entry.EnglishText: Hmm...I don't really want to spend time with them Huma...

Entry.JapaneseText: でも、前はヒューマのじいさんと 一緒に、ここを耕してただろう？ 友達だったじゃないか。
Entry.EnglishText: But didn't you used to till these fields with an old Huma man? Weren't you friends?

Entry.JapaneseText: 前はそうだったさ。 うまくやれるなら、そうしたい。 だが、もうこうなってしまっては……
Entry.EnglishText: That we were. And if we could, I'd like to be friends again. But with how things are now...

Entry.JapaneseText: 仲良くやりたいのは きっと相手も同じです。
Entry.EnglishText: I'm sure he wants to go back to being friends as much as you do.

Entry.JapaneseText: それを信じて、 顔を出してみませんか？ ……ね？
Entry.EnglishText: If you believe in that, then you can find it in you to show up to the party, right?

Entry.JapaneseText: 仲良くしたいのは相手も同じ…… ふーむ…… 少し考えさせてくれ……
Entry.EnglishText: So we both want to get along again... Hmm... I'll consider it...

Entry.JapaneseText: 生まれてこの方、 あんな地鳴りは 聞いた事がない。
Entry.EnglishText: In all my years of life, I've never heard the earth cry out like that.

Entry.JapaneseText: おまえはどうじゃ？
Entry.EnglishText: How about you?

Entry.JapaneseText: ワシも聞いた事ないな。
Entry.EnglishText: Me neither.

Entry.JapaneseText: あれは一体…… 何じゃったのじゃろな……
Entry.EnglishText: I wonder what in the world that was...

Entry.JapaneseText: いつでもスールズに 戻って来るんじゃぞ。
Entry.EnglishText: Come back to Sulz whenever you like.

Entry.JapaneseText: こんな田舎にお客さんかい。 珍しいの。
Entry.EnglishText: We rarely receive guests all the way out here in the sticks.

Entry.JapaneseText: クレアが氷の中から 出られたみたいだの。
Entry.EnglishText: It looks like Claire is finally out of the ice.

Entry.JapaneseText: よかった、よかった……
Entry.EnglishText: How wonderful...

Entry.JapaneseText: スールズはワシが守る！ 安心して行ってこい！
Entry.EnglishText: I'll protect Sulz! You can leave without worry!

Entry.JapaneseText: 皆さん、 <Veigue>の事、頼みますぞ。
Entry.EnglishText: I entrust you to take care of <Veigue>.

Entry.JapaneseText: お二人とも、 <Veigue>の事、頼みますぞ。
Entry.EnglishText: I entrust you two to take care of <Veigue>.

Entry.JapaneseText: 地鳴りが敵じゃ、 ワシの剣の腕も まったく歯が立たぬ。
Entry.EnglishText: If that roar is coming from an enemy, I don't think my sword arm is going to hold up.

Entry.JapaneseText: 逃げるが勝ちって 事もあるからな。
Entry.EnglishText: Live to fight another day, as some would say.

Entry.JapaneseText: どうじゃ、<Veigue>。 ちゃんと剣の稽古は しておるか？
Entry.EnglishText: Well, <Veigue>, have you been keeping up with your sword training?

Entry.JapaneseText: 皆さん、 ワシの剣の手ほどきを 受けんかね。
Entry.EnglishText: Well friends, would you like for me to introduce you to the ways of the sword?

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140>休憩しますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Would you like to rest? Yes No
